CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Country__c)= 'India' && Policy__r.Amountt__c > 0,"INR", IF( TEXT( Country__c ) = 'United Kingdom' && Policy__r.Amountt__c > 0,"£", IF(TEXT( Country__c ) = 'United States' && Policy__r.Amountt__c > 0,"$", IF(TEXT(Country__c ) = 'Australia' && Policy__r.Amountt__c > 0,"A$‎",NULL))))
CustomField.label: Currency Type
